posts.post_content:
Selling a T201 Mecca Crawford/Cobb SGC graded 3 (very good). I don't see any creases. Discoloration on reverse. Asking SOLD shipped. Payment by PPFF. 

"I'll take it" trumps PM.


Thank you.
